tool_description: Creates new diagnostic imaging appointments by reserving equipment, staff, and time slots for veterinary patients.

equipment_id.description: ID of the imaging equipment to be used

estimated_cost.description: Estimated cost of the imaging procedure

error_messages: Patient not found: The specified patient_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid imaging type: Imaging type must match available equipment capabilities.
Staff unavailable: The specified veterinarian or technician is not available at the requested time.
Equipment unavailable: The specified equipment is not available at the requested time.
Invalid priority level: Use one of [routine, urgent, emergency].
Invalid appointment time: Time must be in the future and during operating hours.
Duration mismatch: Duration must be appropriate for the selected imaging type.
Scheduling conflict: The requested time slot conflicts with existing appointments.
usage: Provide all required patient, staff, and equipment information along with desired appointment time to create a new imaging appointment.

appointment_id.description: Unique identifier for the created appointment

confirmation_number.description: Human-readable confirmation number for the appointment

preparation_instructions.description: Instructions for patient preparation before the appointment
